item.description:
Weslyan University is on winter break, thus, so are we until January 23, 2011.

For 2011, visit and practice with us in order to learn about the Buddha's life transforming teachings for lay people and how it is applied to your daily life, relationships and work life. Our meeting are opened to all.

Until the first week of January, registration will be open for our most popular course, Buddhism 101 that explores the life of the historical Buddha and disciples, his teachings, the Eightfold Path, mindfulness and prayer, Zen and the Shin path. Visit our main web site for more details and sign up information. Open to beginners to intermediate.

See our CALENDAR @

www.bffct.net

p.s. REMINDER - Hosted by the Buddhist Faith Fellowship. Even though just one or two people from Meetup have RSVPed, you can expect 35 - 45 people in attendance.
